body:
Lets keep doing these plug.dj events! Everyone enjoys them, and it reinforces the community.

So, to get started whether you have an account or not, go to http://plug.dj/avicus to get plugged into the DJ room, or to create an account.

Remember, no violent, gory or too explicit songs.  Basically nothing inappropriate.

So, just hop on Friday anytime to start the pre-party, or come for the real event that starts at 6:30 EST

title: Regular Friday PlugDJ events

replies.body:
I will constantly make Plug.DJ threads along with your help, as it seems that the majority of the community seems to like it.

I have a few DJ themes planned out ;p

replies.body: I'd be happy to come to these! :)

replies.body: I'll be fixing the events around so that they will fit peoples' schedules. These include people living in GMT time.

replies.body: We will try to have events targeted for different timezones.
